title: Would You Invest in a Cigar Business? - The After Show
itunes:title: Would You Invest in a Cigar Business? - The After Show
description:
Given the opportunity, would you invest in a cigar business? A cigar company is looking for investors. Why are they looking and is this a good opportunity?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
